name: YACHT-VR
description:
YACHT VR is a game-changer when it comes to luxury yacht sales.

This cutting-edge use of technology allows a yacht broker to take their clients on a personalised guided experience through a virtual yacht.

Wow your clients with this photorealistic virtual experience. This tool allows you to conveniently demonstrate any yacht, past, present, or future and even allows you to present models which you may not hold in your marina or even in the country.

The possibilities are endless!
